5.11 The STREAMS module

inner-stream

Open generic function

Summary

Returns the stream being wrapped.

Signature

inner-stream wrapper-stream => wrapped-stream

Arguments

wrapper-stream
An instance of <wrapper-stream>.

Values

wrapped-stream
An instance of <stream>.

Library

io

Module

streams

Description

Returns the stream wrapped by wrapper-stream.

See also

inner-stream-setter, page 73

outer-stream, page 80

<wrapper-stream>, page 109

System and I/O Reference - 31 MAR 2000
